description: This file defines a mock class 'Store2NotificationMock' for testing purposes, which implements the 'INotification' interface from the 'WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2' namespace. It includes mock methods for testing notifications related to store changes.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IStore2::INotification interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: ~Store2NotificationMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock class, defaulted.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate the notification of a changed value in the store, with parameters for scope, namespace, key, and value.
